website_summaries.verdict: The $299 Sentri may look kind of neat, but its touchscreen design doesn't actually add much value. I'd opt for Piper's Classic or NV security systems instead.
pros: Sentri's touchscreen interface gives you access to its security features without an app
Its large display looks nice and it's easy to navigate
cons: its 720p HD video quality is disappointing
I'm not convinced that folks actually want to interact with a static touchscreen (although Sentri does offer the touchscreen and a related app)

customer_reviews.title: No longer supported
customer_reviews.text: While I really like the Sentri even with its limitations, it seems that the company has finally truly given up on the product; both my original one and the one I recently purchased as a hopeful replacement are in a constant boot loop, I'm presuming it's because the backend server isn't available any more. There's no point in buying one unless you can get access to the code and think the hardware is worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Markj

customer_reviews.title: No access while away//What's the point
customer_reviews.text: Was excited when I received it Set up was a breeze Worked flawless until my router was powered off for device Now the weather information tab doesn't function I can't access the Sentri from my cell service Can only access over wifi while at the house This has made the Sentri absolutely useless I have scoured the net looking for solutions to no avail Have tried Resetting, Rebooting, logging out and logging back in Letting the battery run out to start fresh with Setting it up Nothing has brought back the weather functionality or the ability to access it from my phone while away from my house Will return if I am unable to rectify this problem
customer_reviews.author: kattya

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this device.
customer_reviews.text: Although it is relatively inexpensive for a home security camera, the camera only works about 10% of the time. It loses the wireless connection on a regular basis and often displays incorrect temperature readings. The customer support is non-existent and if you are ever able to get an answer back (via email only), it does not offer any help at all, as it is a generic response. The company does not send out any update emails, your system and login, simply quits working! The manufacturer has quit supporting this device and cancelled all accounts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No longer being supported by manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. The Sentri monitor along with its manufacturer are no longer being supported (ie the device does not function for new users). If you do not already have a Sentri account, you cannot use the device.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Morales Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I was especting
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I was especting, audio alarm is not loud enougth, does not work with other zwaves products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal !!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to monitor a 98 year old relative. It's much more than a baby monitor, it's a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: The Cpt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit disappointed. I received the sentri today and it's not working as well as I had hoped. I expected to have a siren option, but there is none on the app. Also, I am not receiving alerts on my phone. I wish I could speak to someone for assistance, but I'll send an email and hope I hear back from someone. If not, it looks like I will have to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is useless. Returned
customer_reviews.text: Unable to create a new account. Product is useless. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Antonin Vrabec

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Now I can check on the house when I'm away.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Don't use unless you like Malware
customer_reviews.text: I liked the unit at first until I checked my firewall logs and saw that it was trying to connect to websites that are known to distribute malware. All of the sites were in China.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sulla

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok....but then...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my unit. It setup quickly. Connected flawlessly... Then I connected my hues bulbs. For a couple days all was good... Until they started disappearing from the listed devices, forcing me to remove them and reconnect them. Now I'm in a heated battle with customer support trying to turn this defective item, and they'd like to make me pay for shipping and charge me a restocking fee... For a defective item.. Buying this thing was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Sentri Home monitoring
customer_reviews.text: Works when it wants to. I get asked what it is all the time. But, notifications do NOT work when motion is detected and the device is set to away mode. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sabino Lagattolla

customer_reviews.title: A Very Expensive Clock -- and not much else
customer_reviews.text: I was a Kickstarter supporter of Sentri, and have had one since early December. In the first month or so, the product had a couple of nice features: alerts (motion-sensing video clips) and "Live View" (see who's in the room). Now, neither of these two features works. They were supposed to work without Sentri's (expensive) subscription. So what one is left with is an attractive but very expensive wall clock. Sentri appears to only marginally exist as a company. They've posted that they are "rethinking [their] corporate direction", but as a practical matter you can expect to get little or no support. It's a shame. It's a nicely-designed physical product, but the software and the service are essentially non-functional.
customer_reviews.author: S. McGeady

customer_reviews.title: Home Security and Automation done right
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sentri trough their Kickstarter Campaing, so I already have it for some weeks now along with my iOS devices. I have to say the product is just stunning and really easy to setup and super easy to use. It doesn't have "TONS" of features yet, but the ones built in works flawlessly, its like an IP camera + weather station + WiFi Hub Controller, all in one. I love it as is it now, and I'm super excited on what it could become.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Noel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible piss poor execution of product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm lucky and got spared from paying a huge amount for a device which is so piss poor executed from its design and intention. A total embarrassment for the people who worked on it and invested in it. 90 % the live feed will not work, camera solution is nice if you like purple and blurr . Every thief would love you to have this system installed because besides the recording you have no clue who the person is, so bad is the video feed and quality. Feel sorry for the people who invested in this project.
customer_reviews.author: Addy Sulley

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this device. I was an original Kickstarter backer and I was such a waste of money and time. Do not, I repeat, DO NOT, buy this
customer_reviews.author: gdrinot

customer_reviews.title: Bad Security Product.
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst security product and like other users, No updates in 2016. Its an expensive watch with low video quality and WIFI disconnects.
customer_reviews.author: manik

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this. I think the company is also going out of busy
customer_reviews.text: I bought my sentri when it first came out for 100-200 dollars I forget the price. I stupidedly signed up for the year long monitoring which is an additional fee. The sentri was always buggy from he beginning and for the last 6 months it completely stopped working. I contacted customer support and they told me to try different adaptors to plug it in all of which failed. Now they tell me to return it for a refund but too late now.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, after an update
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but I've really come to love this thing. Right out of he box this device is pretty basic. After I received the first update (about 24 hours) it started to work great. The alerts come in on my iPhone as well as my girlfriend's Android device. We get alerts everywhere and can also view the live feed whenever, wherever. The only thing I wish for is an update where you can speak through the device from my phone. The Sentri has a microphone and a speaker so I'm curious why it wasn't baked in initially. Either way I really like it and plan on buying another unit.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC

customer_reviews.title: Like a number of other responders I was also an ...
customer_reviews.text: Like a number of other responders I was also an early Kickstarter supporter and am disappointed with my investment. Pink video hues. Low quality video. Constantly having to reset it to my home wifi Support sucks No firmware updates to fix any issues No 2016 firmware updates Quite frankly, the company doesn't give a damn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS. DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 2 days. Now I just have an overpriced sentri logo on the screen. Piece of junk. During the 2 days...never got 1 notification. I had to open up the app to see the alerts. Then within 48 hours...done. Worst $90 I have ever spent. Do not buy this trash
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product, period!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product!!!! Does not work. Customer service is absolutely the worst. No answer. No return call at all. Save your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: carlos chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Security Hub!
customer_reviews.text: Sentri is not your regular home surveillance camera - it's a modern-looking sleek home monitoring system. It has a touch screen panel that displays information like time, temperature, weather forecast, humidity, and air quality. It also has the capability to integrate with other home automation (IoT) products - currently it supports Nest Thermostat. The iOS app is also easy to use with live camera option. I have had the unit for 1 month and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Home Hub!
customer_reviews.text: Sentri is a great product that lets anyone in our family be able to monitor our home at any time. When we're home, we can know the air quality, humidity, temperature, etc. When we're out, we can tune in via our mobile devices and check up on any intrusions as well as control our Nest Thermostat and Philips Hue lightbulbs. It notifies us when there's something weird going on, and we feel much safer knowing Sentri is there to monitor for us. Hope to see a higher resolution screen on it soon!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lin

customer_reviews.title: Useful and nice looking Hub for the house
customer_reviews.text: I funded Sentri from the beginning on Kickstarter, and I must say that I love this device. It has a nice design and display a lot of information with his numerous sensors, such as humidity, weather, and air quality. it is also a surveillance camera with night vision and a good wide angle. It is a young product, as a hub is compatible only with nest but I hope that with future updates increase the number of compatible devices such as Tado° or BloomSky. At the moment is not compatible with HomeKit, it's a shame, I hope that in the future this feature will be implemented.
customer_reviews.author: Pigi Ghinello

customer_reviews.title: It's great being able to see it whenever I want
customer_reviews.text: I use my Sentri to monitor my house during the day. It's great being able to see it whenever I want. The features of home temperature, forecast, humidity and air quality are inspiring me to pay attention on these things. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product meet all the aspect as they stated on their advert. Support team is doing a great job to resolve problem issue
customer_reviews.author: Bill Yeung

product_meta.title: Sentri All-In-One Home Monitoring (Pearl White)
product_meta.description:
Sentri is an all-in-one home monitoring solution that makes any home safer and smarter in seconds. Sentri comes packed with an 120-degree wide angle camera, sensors that track your home's environmental health, a 10.1" touchscreen real-time mobile alerts, and much more -- making sure you're always in the know. 

Sentri is always learning, and includes automatic over-the-air updates that continue to expand the experience you'll get at home. 

What's Inside 
- 120-degree wide-angle HD Camera 
- Night Vision 
- Motion Detection 
- Thermometer 
- Humidity Sensor 
- Air Quality Monitor 
- Backup Battery 

Features 
- Live Video/Audio Streaming 
- Mobile Notification and Alert Timeline 
- Customizable Security Setting 
- Dashboard and Trend Display 
- Control of other smart devices (compatible with Nest Thermostat, Philip Hue, Belkin Wemo) 

Mobile apps available on iOS App Store and Android Play Store 

Visit http://sentri.me/ for more details.
feature_bullets: Simple setup - setup in seconds with no installation required (no cords, cables, or phones)
Sleek hardware matched with a customizable background
Real-time alerts - always stay in the know with real-time alerts, sent straight to your phone
Always getting smarter - automatic over-the-air updates to always improve your Sentri

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.3 out of 5 stars48 ratings2.3 out of 5 stars
